attributes.action: Apply to rejoin The Erasmus+ Scheme
attributes.additional_details: Rejoining The Erasmus+ Scheme would let young people in our country have a educational trip across The EU and vise versa for young EU citizens wanting a education in The UK, it's time The UK rejoined Erasmus+ as a part of a closer relationship with The EU.
attributes.background: The Erasmus+ Scheme was a brilliant scheme for The UK and we benfitted so much from being a part of it, leaving it was a huge consequence of Brexit that shouldn't have happened but we can still rejoin while being outside of The EU.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:

Seek to rejoin the EU Erasmus Scheme
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649867
